values: 开放的；敞开的；敞口的；张开的；张着的；营业中的；对外开放的；可得到的；可进入的；可使用的；公开的；对大众开放的；（思想）开明的；坦率的；坦诚的；未解决的；悬而未决的；开阔的；稀疏的；空旷的；宽敞的；松散的；不紧密的；没扣上的；断开的；未连接的；畅通的
开；打开；睁开；开启（瓶盖、封口等）；开辟；开通；开设；开幕；启动；着手；开放；开业；营业；开办；开课；揭幕；开启；让通行；使通畅；使无遮挡；准备接待；以…开篇
公开；公开赛；户外；露天；野外；旷野；空旷地带；开放区域；开阔地；开放时间；营业时间；开放状态；非秘密

synonym.mean: 公开的；敞开的；空旷的；坦率的；营业着的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位
[五金] 开启工具；开启的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指把原来关起来或盖紧的东西打开。
主要指把原来包好、卷好或叠好的东西再打开。
指未被占有，从而可被别人得到的。
指上面没有写字、印刷或做记号的空白表面，或指上面留着准备被填写的空白处。
普通用词，侧重某物或某个位置没有被占用。
指空无一人或一物，或空洞无意义的。
指不隐瞒自己的秘密，愿意向他人表露自己或公开暴露自己的缺点。
强调毫无保留地畅所欲言，不受任何约束。
侧重指一个人出自内心地对某人某事表示一种诚意。
指讲话坦白直率、不客气，但隐含不得体、不顾及他人感情等意味。
指遵守正直等道德准则。
指直言不讳，毫不做作或故弄玄虚。
多用于答复、叙述等场合。指直截了当，不回避，或故弄玄虚。

word_group.brief_definition: 热烈地, 热情地, 诚挚地
开放率；公开率；开启速率

bilingual.target: 现在不要打开你的礼物！
突然，一扇门猛地打开了。

bilingual.source: How do you open a new document?
bilingual.target: 你如何打开一个新文件？

bilingual.source: The great doors of the palace swung open.
In China, we open a gift later.
bilingual.target: 在中国，我们稍后才打开礼物。

list.abstract: open是多种语言、环境的一种函数，LINUX中open函数作用：打开和创建文件。PB程序语言中open功能：打开窗口。

yingyinNormal.en: And there's pictures. Don't open them. Do not open them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有图片呢，别打开，千万别打开。

yingyinNormal.en: Goodwin, open this god damn door！
yingyinNormal.zh: 戈德温，把这该死的门打开。

yingyinNormal.en: It opens a door I don't want to open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样会打开一扇我不想开的门。

yingyinNormal.en: When this door closes, it will not open again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当那扇门再次关上，就再也不会打开了。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want me to terminate Professor Callaghan? Just open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否要去杀卡拉汉教授？打开就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Open your present. Can you guess what it is? I've no idea. Open it and see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打开你的礼物。你能猜出来是什么吗？我猜不出来。你打开看看吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, open it, will you? I want to see what $100,000 looks like. Yeah, come on. Me, too. Let's have a look. Open it. Yeah, yeah, go on. Open it, Mr. Moon. For sure, I'll open it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那打开看看，我还从来没有见过十万块钱呢。真的，我也是。让我们看看吧，打开吧。是啊，先生，打开让我们看看吧。当然可以。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy, Mummy, open your present. Can you guess what it is? I've no idea. Open it and see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，妈妈，你打开你的礼物。你能猜出来是什么吗？我猜不出来。你打开看看吧。

yingyinNormal.en: First, windows. Conventional. Open, closed. Open, closed. Halfway open. Or halfway closed, depending on your philosophical bent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，窗户，很常见。打开，关上。打开，关上。开一半，或者说关一半，这取决于你的哲学取向。

yingyinNormal.en: When I fail to open this jar and you succeed, it will establish you as the alpha male.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我没打开这瓶盖，而你打开了，这样你就像个男子汉。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to show the kids how to open one. You mean like this? Daddy already showed us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要教孩子们怎么打开。你是说打开这个吗？爸爸已经教过我们了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look on the table in front of you. Open the envelope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看你们面前的桌子，打开那个信封。

yingyinNormal.en: They have been all along. I suggest you open one up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们一直都在，我建议你打开一个看看。

yingyinNormal.en: It is critical that he keeps his hand open and touches nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他必须保持手掌打开避免任何接触。

yingyinNormal.en: You will take the wall and open the gate to all China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 摧毁那座高耸的城墙就打开了通往中原的大门。

yingyinNormal.en: I actually can't. My hips don't open wider than 22 degrees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我骑不了，我的臀部不能打开超过22度。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you just open it? Oh, my God! You guys are great!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不想现在就打开它吗？喔，天哪，你们真好。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you going to remove my health care chip? Yes, open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否要移除我的医疗保健芯片？是啊，打开。

yingyinNormal.en: What, what's that? It's my VISA bill. Envelope one of two. That can't be good. Open it, open it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？我的信用卡帐单，两封里的第一封，不可能是好事。打开来看看。

yingyinNormal.en: Huh. Everyone take out your Scaring textbooks and open them to chapter one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家拿出惊吓课本，打开到第1章。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 上映; 上演; 开幕
敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 缺口；空；开始；开始部分；首映；首演；空缺职位；落成典礼；工作机会；开案陈述
n. 公开；开放；率真；开阔

word_family.mean: adj. 开着的；露天的；展开的；营业着的；对…开放；坦率的；坦诚的；悬而未决的；容许争议的；开的；开放的；开路的；断路的；松散的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 开放率；公开率；开启速率

examination_example.sentence: A bachelor's degree <highlight>opens</highlight> more doors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学士学位会打开更多的门。

examination_example.sentence: The court did suggest that accepting favors in return for <highlight>opening</highlight> doors is "distasteful" and "nasty."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院的确认为收受好处并因此为他人开门作为回报的行为 “令人不快” 且 “下流龌龊”。

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy the beauty of the world around and keep the eyes <highlight>open</highlight> to see the possibilities before you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 享受周围世界的美丽，睁大眼睛，看看你面前的可能性。

sense_info_list.en: freely available or accessible; offered without restriction

examination_example.sentence: More than half of all British scientific research is now published under <highlight>open</highlight> access terms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，超过一半的英国科学研究是以开放获取条款发表的。

examination_example.sentence: In Britain the move towards <highlight>open</highlight> access publishing has been driven by funding bodies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，开放存取出版的趋势是由资助机构推动的。

examination_example.sentence: A recent paper, titled "The Natural Selection of Bad Science", published on the Royal Society's <highlight>open</highlight> science website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一篇题为“不良科学的自然选择”的论文发表在皇家学会的开放科学网站上。

examination_example.sentence: Phrasee claims their software can outperform humans by up to 10 percent when it comes to email <highlight>open</highlight> rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Phrasee声称，在电子邮件打开率方面，他们的软件可以超过人类10%。

examination_example.sentence: Some AI software can analyze and optimize marketing email subject lines to increase <highlight>open</highlight> rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人工智能软件可以分析和优化营销电子邮件主题行，以提高打开率。

examination_example.sentence: The lesson is not that you should make your personal life an <highlight>open</highlight> book, but you should just be honest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教训不是你应该让你的个人生活成为一本打开的书，而是你应该诚实。

sense_info_list.en: establish a new business, movement, or enterprise

examination_example.sentence: More than half a century ago, the Massachusetts Institute of Technology <highlight>opened</highlight> its Center for Advanced Visual Studies to explore the role of technology in culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 半个多世纪前，麻省理工学院开设了高级视觉研究中心，以探索技术在文化中的作用。

examination_example.sentence: "Each book <highlight>opens</highlight> up new avenues of knowledge to explore", Gates says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 盖茨说:“每本书都开辟了新的知识探索途径。”

examination_example.sentence: Looking beyond the culture war logic of right or wrong means <highlight>opening</highlight> up the middle ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超越对错的文化战争逻辑意味着开放中间地带。

examination_example.sentence: They cross-check sources and prefer news from different perspectives — especially those that are <highlight>open</highlight> about any bias.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们交叉检查来源，更喜欢不同角度的新闻——尤其是那些对任何偏见都持开放态度的新闻。

examination_example.sentence: It takes a while to judge complex aspects of personality, like neuroticism or <highlight>open</highlight>-mindedness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 判断性格的复杂方面需要一段时间，比如神经质或思想开放。

examination_example.sentence: Be <highlight>open</highlight> to hearing other opinions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乐于听取其他意见。

examination_example.sentence: But it has already sparked significant controversy, with the United States trade representative <highlight>opening</highlight> an investigation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但随着美国贸易代表开始展开调查，这已经引发了重大争议。

sense_info_list.zh: 上映; 上演; 开幕

examination_example.sentence: I also remember that the musical play Hair <highlight>opened</highlight> on Broadway on the same day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还记得音乐剧《头发》在同一天在百老汇上映。

examination_example.sentence: Pledging to run Pilgrim safely, the company has applied for federal permission to keep it <highlight>open</highlight> for another 20 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司承诺安全运营Pilgrim，并已申请联邦许可，将其再开放20年。

sense_info_list.zh: 敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 是把原先关闭或封起来的东西打开，与close相对用一句话来区别二者。
是把原先折叠或卷起来的东西打开，与fold相对。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开业; 开放; 打开
敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 缺口；空；开始；开始部分；首映；首演；空缺职位；落成典礼；工作机会；开案陈述
n. 公开；开放；率真；开阔
v. 再开；重新打开；重新开始
n. 开启物；首场；首粒进球；开场的话；开局者；开叫人

word_family.mean: adj. 开着的；露天的；展开的；营业着的；对…开放；坦率的；坦诚的；悬而未决的；容许争议的；开的；开放的；开路的；断路的；松散的

sense_info_list.zh: 开业; 开放; 打开

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't sound like you had <highlight>open</highlight> communication with him or her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听起来你并没有和他或她进行坦诚交流。

examination_example.sentence: Probing the rock pools of a local beach or practising French on a language exchange can <highlight>open</highlight> their eyes to life's possibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在当地海滩的岩石池里探索，或者通过语言交流练习法语，都可以让他们了解到升到生活中的许多可能。

examination_example.sentence: Macy's reported its sales plunged 5.2% in November and December at stores <highlight>open</highlight> more than a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梅西百货(Macy's)报告称，在开业一年多的商店中11月和12月的销售额暴跌5.2％。

sense_info_list.en: establish a new business, movement, or enterprise

examination_example.sentence: It has plans to <highlight>open</highlight> more locations of Macy's Backstage, a newly-developed off-price concept which might help it better compete with ambitious T. J. Maxx.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它计划在 Macy's Backstage 开设更多地点，这个新开发的低价概念可能有助于它与雄心勃勃的 T. J. Maxx 竞争。

sense_info_list.zh: 敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

examination_example.sentence: Most people feel nervous sitting across from a hiring manager, answering questions that effectively <highlight>open</highlight> themselves up for judgment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人坐在招聘经理的对面，回答让自己接受评判的问题时会感到紧张。

sense_info_list.en: if you welcome someone with open arms , you are extremely happy and pleased to see them

examination_example.sentence: They welcome it with <highlight>open</highlight> arms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们热烈地欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: It's easier to be <highlight>open</highlight>-minded when you aren't feeling defensive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你没有防御性的时候，更容易保持开放的心态。

word_usage.usage:
open既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作不及物动词时，多表示某物自身具有打开的性质。
及物：Please open the door for me. 
请帮我把门打开。
不及物：Does the door open inwards or outwards?
那门是朝里开还是朝外开?

表示一种状态时应该用系表结构be open，此时open是形容词。
示例：商店开门了吗?
误 Are the shops opened yet?
正 Are the shops open yet?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开业; 开放; 打开
敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 缺口；空；开始；开始部分；首映；首演；空缺职位；落成典礼；工作机会；开案陈述
v. 再开；重新打开；重新开始
n. 公开；开放；率真；开阔

word_family.mean: adj. 开着的；露天的；展开的；营业着的；对…开放；坦率的；坦诚的；悬而未决的；容许争议的；开的；开放的；开路的；断路的；松散的

sense_info_list.zh: 开业; 开放; 打开

examination_example.sentence: A man in Halifax, Canada, wanted to find out if people were thankful for someone holding the door <highlight>open</highlight> for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加拿大哈利法克斯的一名男子想知道人们是否感谢他们开门的人。

examination_example.sentence: They held doors <highlight>open</highlight> for people at various places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在不同的地方为人们敞开大门。

examination_example.sentence: Byun Young-in chairs Songdo real estate association and started selling property here when the first phase of the city <highlight>opened</highlight> in 2005.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Byun Young-in 松岛房地产协会的会长，2005年松岛城一期开盘时，他就开始在这里销售房产。

examination_example.sentence: Textbook publishers connect professors, instructors and students in ways that alternatives, such as <highlight>open</highlight> e-textbooks and <highlight>open</highlight> educational resources, simply do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书出版商将教授、教师和学生联系在一起，这是其他替代性选择(如开放式电子教科书和开放式教育资源)根本无法做到的。

examination_example.sentence: Also, being <highlight>open</highlight> to new ideas had no relationship to long life, which might explain all those bad-tempered old people who are fixed in their ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，对新思想持开放态度与长寿没有关系，这可能解释了为什么那些脾气不好的老人总是一成不变。

examination_example.sentence: Some, like Mr. Azar's plastic bag, are <highlight>open</highlight> to argument as to how they work, or whether they really work at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些，比如阿扎尔的塑料袋，对它们是如何工作的，或者它们是否真的工作，存在很多争议。

sense_info_list.zh: 敞开心扉; 坦白的; 直率的

examination_example.sentence: They tend to be more <highlight>open</highlight> in interpersonal relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在人际关系上往往更开放。

examination_example.sentence: That is why being self- aware, investing in broader networks of friends, and being <highlight>open</highlight> to new ideas will become even more crucial skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么了解自己，投资更广人脉，并乐于接受新思想这些技能将会变得更加重要。

examination_example.sentence: I'm always a fan of being <highlight>open</highlight> and honest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我总是喜欢开诚布公。

sense_info_list.en: establish a new business; movement; or enterprise

examination_example.sentence: Jan moved from Idaho with her husband in 1972 and <highlight>opened</highlight> a restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1972年，简和丈夫从爱达荷州搬来，开了一家餐馆。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Opening</highlight> a gym and becoming personal trainers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开一家健身房，成为私人教练。

word_usage.usage:
open既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作不及物动词时，多表示某物自身具有打开的性质。
及物：Please open the door for me. 
请帮我把门打开。
不及物：Does the door open inwards or outwards?
那门是朝里开还是朝外开?

表示一种状态时应该用系表结构be open，此时open是形容词。
示例：商店开门了吗?
误 Are the shops opened yet?
正 Are the shops open yet?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开业; 开放; 打开

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (使某事物)成为可能；开门；营业；开业；发展；开始发生；出现；张开

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 缺口；空；开始；开始部分；首映；首演；空缺职位；落成典礼；工作机会；开案陈述
v. 再开；重新打开；重新开始
n. 公开；开放；率真；开阔
n. 开启物；首场；首粒进球；开场的话；开局者；开叫人

word_family.mean: adj. 开着的；露天的；展开的；营业着的；对…开放；坦率的；坦诚的；悬而未决的；容许争议的；开的；开放的；开路的；断路的；松散的

sense_info_list.zh: 开业; 开放; 打开

examination_example.sentence: After all, coworking spaces also typically use an <highlight>open</highlight> office layout.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，共同工作空间通常也采用开放式办公室布局。

examination_example.sentence: A moment later, he began to climb the <highlight>half-open</highlight> window—one leg went over it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了一会儿，他开始爬上半开的窗户，一条腿跨过了窗户。

examination_example.sentence: The rhino section will be <highlight>open</highlight> to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 犀牛展区将对公众开放。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (open up)提供; 使可能; 可达到
未决定的; 待决定的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 缺口；空；开始；开始部分；首映；首演；空缺职位；落成典礼；工作机会；开案陈述

word_family.mean: adj. 开着的；露天的；展开的；营业着的；对…开放；坦率的；坦诚的；悬而未决的；容许争议的；开的；开放的；开路的；断路的；松散的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 敞开心扉；开火；（使某事物）成为可能；可达到

examination_example.sentence: the door is <highlight>opened</highlight> by the passenger
examination_example.sentence_trans: 车门由乘客打开

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>opened</highlight> the door and slipped the album inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我打开门，把相册塞进去。

examination_example.sentence: Would you mind <highlight>opening</highlight> the window a bit more?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你介意把窗户开大一点吗？

examination_example.sentence: However, it only had 100 students and four teachers when it was <highlight>open</highlight> on September 10th, 1961.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，它在1961年9月10日开业时只有100名学生和4名教师。

examination_example.sentence: B. The Palace Museum never <highlight>opened</highlight> after dark.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 故宫天黑以后从不开门。

examination_example.sentence: My friend's new restaurant in Wanda Plaza( 万达广场 ) was <highlight>open</highlight> two  years ago, but I  haven't been there so far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我朋友在万达广场的新餐厅两年前开张了，但我至今没去过。

examination_example.sentence: The school <highlight>opens</highlight> on Monday
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校周一开学

examination_example.sentence: Secondly, ask them <highlight>open</highlight>-ended questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，问他们开放式的问题。

examination_example.sentence: This show is <highlight>open</highlight> year round and included with regular Zoo admission.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该节目全年开放，并包含在常规动物园门票中。

examination_example.sentence: YMT's summer camps are <highlight>open</highlight> to anyone aged 6-17 looking to develop their acting, singing and dancing abilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: YMT的夏令营面向 6-17岁希望发展自己的表演、歌唱和舞蹈能力的任何人开放。

sense_info_list.en: establish a new business, movement, or enterprise

examination_example.sentence: His wish came true, and the museum <highlight>opened</highlight> in 1759, six years after Sir Hans Sloane died.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的愿望实现了，博物馆在汉斯·斯隆爵士去世六年后的 1759 年开立了。

examination_example.sentence: My father had always wanted to <highlight>open</highlight> a small restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我父亲一直想开一家小餐馆。

examination_example.sentence: In 1951, a new English-language bookstore named "Le Mistral" was <highlight>opened</highlight> in Paris.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1951年，一家名为“Le Mistral”的新英文书店在巴黎成立。

examination_example.sentence: Sleepwalkers' eyes are <highlight>open</highlight>, but they don't see the same way they do when they're awake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦游者的眼睛是睁着的，但他们看东西的方式和他们醒着的时候不一样。

examination_example.sentence: 2. <highlight>open</highlight> your eyes
examination_example.sentence_trans: 睁开你的眼睛

examination_example.sentence: When she <highlight>opened</highlight> her eyes, she saw Doctor Tim holding her tooth, smiling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她睁开眼睛时，她看到蒂姆医生拿着她的牙齿，微笑着。

examination_example.sentence: Just like other animals, they can find enough to eat, and know when it is a sale to be out in the <highlight>open</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像其他动物一样，它们可以找到足够的食物，并且知道什么时候可以公开出售。

examination_example.sentence: With the help of AI, MOOC, or Massive <highlight>Open</highlight> Online Course, allows students around the world to take classes online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 借助人工智能、慕课或大规模的线上公开课，可以让来自世界各地的学生在线上课。

examination_example.sentence: Be <highlight>open</highlight> and honest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开诚布公。

examination_example.sentence: That is to say, you need to be <highlight>open</highlight>—minded with a loving heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，你需要心胸开阔，充满爱心。

examination_example.sentence: "If they're not <highlight>open</highlight> about it", he warns, "it can greatly harm the parent and child relationship."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他警告说：“如果他们对此不公开，这会极大地伤害父母和孩子的关系。”

sense_info_list.zh: (open up)提供; 使可能; 可达到

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>opens</highlight> up the other person to look at the data again and shows that you won't change your opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让对方再次看数据，向他们表明你不会改变你的观点。

examination_example.sentence: Kelly would like to study in a clean, <highlight>open</highlight> space, while Maria works best with books, papers and other things around her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凯莉喜欢在干净、开放的空间里学习，而玛丽亚最擅长和书籍、文件以及周边其他的事物打交道。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>open</highlight>-air museum is about 15 minutes' walk away from the center of Goreme.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露天博物馆距离格雷梅市中心约有15分钟步行路程。

sense_info_list.zh: 未决定的; 待决定的

examination_example.sentence: Space travel may soon be a reality, but how visitors get there is still a very <highlight>open</highlight> question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太空旅行可能很快成为现实，但游客如何到达那里仍然是一个非常悬而未决的问题。

word_usage.usage:
open既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作不及物动词时，多表示某物自身具有打开的性质。
及物：Please open the door for me. 
请帮我把门打开。
不及物：Does the door open inwards or outwards?
那门是朝里开还是朝外开?

表示一种状态时应该用系表结构be open，此时open是形容词。
示例：商店开门了吗?
误 Are the shops opened yet?
正 Are the shops open yet?
